metadata.name: Uncommon Child Process Of BgInfo.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects uncommon child processes of "BgInfo.exe" which could be a sign of potential abuse of the binary to proxy execution via external VBScript

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\bginfo.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\bginfo64.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects uncommon child processes of "BgInfo.exe" which could be a sign of potential abuse of the binary to proxy execution via external VBScript
